verbose_text: Our results demonstrated that nicorandil increased Akt phosphorylation and these protective effects were effectively blocked by a PI3K inhibitor (LY294002), strongly suggesting an essential role for the PI3K / Akt signaling pathway in the nicorandil mediated protection of MSCs exposed to H/SD.
evidence: Akt phosphorylation and these protective effects were effectively blocked by a PI3K inhibitor (LY294002), strongly suggesting an essential role for the PI3K
